mapper.select: select m.*, u.username as fromName from message m join user u on m.fromId = u.userId where sessionId = #{sessionId} order by createTime

select m.messageId, m.sessionId, m.fromId, u.username as fromName, m.content, m.createTime from message m join user u on m.fromId = u.userId where m.sessionId = #{sessionId} and m.content like concat('%', #{query}, '%') order by m.createTime
select content from message where sessionId = #{sessionId} and status = 0 order by createTime desc limit 1
